posts.post_content:
I'm hoping Frank will stop in and write a witty description for this card.  For now, I'll just say that this is a pretty cool looking card with lots of extra red ink.  No creases/wrinkles.  Trimmed along the bottom.

$29 shipped within US
That's a bloody ear lobe.  His moellers are in his mouth.;)
How do you know they aren't bloody though?  He's not looking too good.
Sold!  Thanks Frank, we did it!

[quote name="Luke" post=1625721]Sold!  Thanks Frank, we did it![/QUOTE]

That was pretty funny. How much does Frank charge for BST assists?

[quote name="Leon" post=1627311]That was pretty funny. How much does Frank charge for BST assists?[/QUOTE]

Leon, if you have ask it, you can't afford one.
